text: is a 1957 Japanese historical drama movie directed by Akira Kurosawa and based on the William Shakespeare's play Macbeth. It stars Toshiro Mifune, Isuzu Yamada, Takashi Shimura, Akira Kubo, Kokuten Kōdō and was distributed by Toho. ==Other websites== * * Category:1957 drama movies Category:Japanese drama movies Category:Movies directed by Akira Kurosawa
title: Throne of Blood
